body.p: Here come some advices to the teacher.

In many games the pupils may choose to work with certain sentence sets, marked SMEA, SMEB or SMEC. It is also possible to choose a specific sentence, e.g. SMEA143. By writing SMEA1 one will get all sentences starting with SMEA1, thus SMEA1, SMEA10, SMEA11 etc.
The sentence sets may be found here: Cealkkačoakkáldagat
